doc:
David Holt (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Holt_(American_actor) 0 David Jack Holt (August 14, 1927 – November 15, 2003) was an American actor initially groomed at the age of seven to be the male Shirley Temple. After several supporting roles as a juvenile actor in films during the 1930s–1940s, he experienced family stress and left acting by the time he was 25. He subsequently had success as a songwriter, before his death in 2003 at the age of 76. David_Jack_Holt ( August_14_,_1927 – November_15_,_2003 ) was an_American_actor initially_groomed at the_age of seven to_be the_male_Shirley_Temple . After several_supporting_roles as a_juvenile_actor in films during the_1930s – 1940s , he experienced family_stress and left_acting by the_time he was 25 . He subsequently had success as a_songwriter , before his_death in 2003 at the_age of 76 .
